com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex

Class AbstractMatchProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.AbstractMatchProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatchProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoNothingProcessor, ReplacingProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractMatchProcessor
extends Object
implements MatchProcessor
    Helps to return a MatchProcessorResult that cannot cause an endless loop.
    Since:
    10.11.2013
    Author:
    rwoo

    • Method Detail

      • createResult

        protected MatchProcessorResult createResult(MatchResult matchResult,
                                int newMatchEnd,
                                boolean continueMatching)
        Parameters:
        matchResult - the MatchResult given to the MatchProcessor.
        newMatchEnd - the position of the end of the matched string after the character buffer is modified.
        continueMatching - See MatchProcessorResult.isContinueMatching()
        Returns:
        Returns a MatchProcessorResult that cannot cause an endless loop.
